name: HaikuReader
0:
”Alexa, open Haiku Reader.”
”Ask Haiku Reader to read a poem.”
”Tell Haiku Reader to give me a Haiku.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: haiku reader
des: Start Haiku Reader by saying: "Alexa, open Haiku Reader" or try: "Alexa, ask Haiku Reader to give me a poem." directly to get read one of many selected modern or classic Haikus.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
